message: When we pass through the door, we find ourselves in a world of darkness.
I don't mean the lighting. Everything is just dark.
Every building is painted in dark colors, and sports gruesome decor, like chains and barbed wire.
The buildings themselves, though, seem quite nice. They're clearly dedicated to the 'darkness' theme here.
Most of the people walking around look my age or older.
The sky is filled with glittering stars. You'd never see that in the Old Residential District.
Both the weather and time of day are artificially controlled in Platinum Jail. Apparently, it's almost always night inside.
Supposedly the idea is to make it feel like a party every day, or make it more relaxing or something...
But the most prominent thing in the sky is the tower窶付he symbol of Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's Oval Tower..."
I've heard the rumors, but this is my first time seeing it.
Mink scans the street, then glares at Oval Tower.

name: ミンク
message: "What exactly does that invitation say?"
I pull it up on my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It has a map."

name: 蓮
message: "It's a guide to Platinum Jail."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What about this mark?"

name: 蓮
message: "That must be where we're staying."

name: ミンク
message: "Take us there."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay. Ren, I'll let you handle directions."

name: 蓮
message: "Roger."
Following Ren's directions, we head for the spot marked on the map.
